properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 3:09AM PST until February 8 at 2:45AM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Washington...

Naches River near Cliffdell affecting Yakima County

The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Naches River near Cliffdell.
* from this morning to late tonight...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 3:00 AM Friday, the stage was 30.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 31.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this morning and continue to
rise to near 31.1 feet by late this afternoon. The river will fall
below flood stage by this evening.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown. Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility
vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow
for safe passage. As little as one foot of water on the road can move
most vehicles off the road.
